thread.title: Dong B Han
thread.title_full: Biz2Credit reviewed by Dong B Han

author: Dong B Han
title: Dong B Han
text:
John Feeney was very professional and helped me with my business loan in a very quick timely manner.
I am very happy with the results of my business loan.
I would recommend Biz2Credit to anyone that needs a business loan.
They are very quick and efficient and handled my loan in a professional manner.
Tina
